title: Research & Skills
text:
Methodologies & Concepts
I utilize a variety of computational approaches to extract biological meaning from raw sequencing data.






Differential Gene Expression (DGE)
Identifying significant transcriptional changes between leukemia subtypes is central to my work. I use DESeq2 and edgeR to isolate differentially expressed genes (DEGs) that serve as potential biomarkers.





Sample Volcano Plot showing significant upregulation






WGCNA Network Analysis
Beyond single genes, I analyze gene networks to find clusters (modules) of highly correlated genes. This helps in identifying ‚Äúhub genes‚Äù that drive specific cancer phenotypes.





Module-Trait Relationship Heatmap

title: Research & Skills
text:
Current Projects

1. Transcriptomic Landscape of Indian B-ALL

Objective: To characterize the genetic profile of B-ALL in the Indian population using RNA-Seq.
Role: Lead researcher; performed QC, alignment, fusion calling, and downstream statistical analysis.
Outcome: Identified novel fusion partners and subtype-specific expression signatures.



2. Predictive Modeling for High-Risk Leukemia

Objective: Developing a classifier to stratify patients into risk groups based on gene expression.
Tools: R (Caret, RandomForest), Survival Analysis.

title: Gadha Krishna Leons
text:
I am a PhD Scholar at the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi, operating at the intersection of Molecular Biology and Bioinformatics.
With a strong foundation in bench-based cancer research, I have pivoted to computational biology‚Äîand I am loving every minute of it. My current work integrates transcriptomics (RNA-Seq), machine learning, and clinical data to decipher the molecular landscape of B-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (B-ALL).
I am analyzing expression-based RNA-Seq data from a large Indian B-ALL cohort to reveal subtype-specific expression patterns, fusion events, and transcriptomic profiles. My ultimate goal is to uncover diagnostic and prognostic biomarkers that can improve treatment strategies.
I am actively seeking Postdoctoral opportunities in genomics and data-driven biology to further explore how code can solve real-world biological problems.




Cancer Genomics  Transcriptomics  Precision Medicine Functional Genomics



PhD in Hematologic Oncology | 2022 - Present AIIMS, New Delhi, India
MSc in Applied Genetics | 2017 - 2019 Bangalore University, India
BSc in Genetics | 2014 - 2017 Ramaiah College, India
